title: Baluhawa
text: Baluhawa is a <a href="Village%20development%20committee%20%28Nepal%29">village development committee</a> in the <a href="Kapilvastu%20District">Kapilvastu District</a>, of the <a href="Lumbini%20Zone">Lumbini Zone</a>, in <a href="Nepal">Nepal</a>. At the time of the <a href="1991%20Nepal%20census">1991 Nepal census</a>, it had a population of 3774 people that were living in 600 individual households.
